text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Dia, I... I was totally clueless. About<n>what it means to run at
Tracen<n>Academy, and probably about<n>everything else too.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I pictured myself training and growing<n>stronger... and
winning lots of<n>glamorous races! I fully believed I<n>could do
it if I just worked hard<n>enough.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But I never imagined what that "hard<n>work" would actually
look like, or how<n>much of it I'd need to put in if I really<n>
wanted to win.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Teio overcomes all those challenges<n>and keeps on running.
That's what<n>makes her so strong and incredible.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Yeah... You're right.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
To become someone like her... Do I<n>really have what it takes
to push<n>myself that far?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Do I really have what it takes to put a<n>smile on people's
faces?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I know what you mean—it's a scary<n>thing. We just learned
how tough the<n>racing world really is, after all.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: You feel the same?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I thought I had the necessary resolve,<n>but I was just being
naive.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Still, you know what? I think we're<n>going to be just fine!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Because I'm right beside you, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Do you remember what Nature told us<n>before? The thing
you need to become<n>a shining star...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sorry. Yeah—I'm talking about<n>the protagonists of
the academy.<n>You'll see Teio and McQueen aren't<n>the
only shining stars here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Everyone here has dreams and the<n>raw skills to see them
through. It's a<n>hearty full-course feast of<n>protagonists,
each with their own<n>rivals!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Dreams, skills... and rivals.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Kita, you're a very precious friend to<n>me... but you're just
as precious to<n>me as a rival!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Remember when we first met? That<n>day, you had come to
help with some<n>volunteer work.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You were the first Umamusume my<n>age I had ever talked to,
so I was<n>really nervous.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
And I was surprised that there was<n>someone out there
faster than me! It<n>really opened my eyes!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
After that, you took me to lots of new<n>places. You taught me
so many things,<n>like how to play the games at the<n>candy
shop and how to take a tumble.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You led the way as we ran together,<n>opening my eyes to the
vastness of<n>the world around us. Staring at your<n>back in
front of me, I came to realize<n>something.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I wanted to surpass you—to take the<n>lead myself.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Dia...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
For as long as I've known you,<n>you've always loved
helping people.<n>Maybe you were just showing me<n>the
same kindness.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: But it was different for me. I've<n>always seen you as a rival.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
It's true that the other students here<n>are incredible. No
matter how hard we<n>work, we may never catch up to<n>
them. But even so...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
As long as you're running ahead of<n>me, I won't stop trying
to overtake<n>you. I'll keep improving until I can.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: So let's keep running together, Kita.<n>From now until forever!

text_block_list.name: Young Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Cross my heart and hope to die.Together forever, you and I!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(That's right. From the first time I met<n>Dia, I knew she was
different from my<n>other friends.)

text_block_list.name: Young Satono
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to win a G1 race and make<n>everyone's dream
come true!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(She was naive and a little detached,<n>but she never cried
when she fell. And<n>she was always upfront and honest<n>to
me about her dreams.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(No matter how hard I tried to sprint<n>ahead, she always
stuck close behind.<n>Eventually, we wound up running<n>side
by side.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (It was frustrating... and it made me<n>want to get better.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Thanks, Dia. I guess I let my worries<n>get the better of me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But having a rival to push you in the<n>right direction... That's
such an<n>inspiring thought!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I may not know everything about<n>dreams or what it means
to run—or<n>even my own potential. But still...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I have a rival to run alongside me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
That's why no matter how tough<n>things get, I'll be okay. I
can smile and<n>overcome any obstacle with you by<n>my
side, Dia!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I should warn you—I won't let<n>you catch up to me
during races! So<n>you'd better be ready!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: ...! Same here! I don't plan on losing!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Someday, I'm gonna become a<n>stronger version of myself
and<n>achieve my dreams...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Because I've decided to chase them<n>with you!
